title: version 2.5:
message:
version 2.5:

* add support for hardware keyboard keys (ctrl, tab, arrows)
* also update build scripts for Android Studio 2.3.3

title: version 2.4.2
message:
version 2.4.2

* fixed duplicate character input from android keyboard
  was broken on some devices (such as LG K8 V)

* creating keypair with null passphrase would still prompt for passphrase
  now it creates the keypair with no passphrase instead of one with empty string

title: version 2.4.1
message:
version 2.4.1

* add 'reconnect' button to menu to reconnect a disconnected session
* show hardware address on network interfaces screen (sdk >= 9)
* update from jsch-0.1.51 to 0.1.53

title: version 2.4
message:
version 2.4

- tunneled vnc client
- tab stops and reset for shell screen
- fix compiler warnings

title: version 2.3
message:
version 2.3

vt-100 keyboard and more escape code handling

also update to newer Android Studio build files
for access to android.support.v7.widget.GridLayout

title: version 2.2
message:
version 2.2

- basic escape sequenxces for color and cursor positioning
- restart exited shell thread when switching to shell screen
  if it had exited
- add 'network interfaces' selection to menu

title: version 2.1
message:
version 2.1

- add OK button to connect screen
  in case there is no DONE/NEXT button on keyboard
